actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require monitoring of emissions of certain air pollutants emitted by fossil fuel steam generators operated by public utilities.

summary.text: Requires, under the Clean Air Act, the monitoring of emissions of specified air pollutants emitted by fossil fuel steam generators operated by public utilities. Provides for the measurement to be used in such monitoring.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require monitoring of emissions of certain air pollutants emitted by fossil fuel steam generators operated by public utilities.
